reviewText:
Conversational, friendly with a touch of humor.
I bought this for my mother. She's been doing watercolors for about 4 months. I watched it with her. I enjoyed it. He does mention briefly that he has his own line of 7 brushes and palette.
The production values are mostly good. There's a flicker of light levels every now and then. Watch in a quiet room as the sound only goes up so far.
For more information, go to artistsnetwork website and search his name.
